game.name: Catio Simulator
game.shortDescription: Catio Simulator is a casual clicker game in which you decorate a catio to attract cats. Pet your cats to get them ready for adoption, collect adoption fees, and buy new decorations and petting abilities!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Catio Simulator is a casual clicker game in which you decorate a catio to attract cats. Pet your cats to get them ready for adoption, collect adoption fees, and buy new decorations and petting abilities!
